# Mermaid Pipeline Component

A reusable GitLab CI pipeline component that generates Mermaid diagrams as SVG image files. This component searches recursively through your project to find Mermaid files by name, converts them to SVG format, and preserves the directory structure in the output.

> **Requires** a tag input to be provided

## Input Parameters

| Parameter | Default | Description |
|-----------|---------|-------------|
| `stage` | `build` | The CI/CD stage where the job will run |
| `job_name` | `diagram` | Name of the generated job |
| `tag` | `None` | Runner tag to use for the job (required for job run) |
| `input_files` | `["*.mmd"]` | Array of filenames, glob patterns, or single string |


### Basic Usage (Single File)
```yaml
include:
  - component: $CI_SERVER_FQDN/gadhs/standard/pipeline-components/mermaid/diagram@v1.1.1
    inputs:
      stage: build
      job_name: diagram
      tag: runner-tag-name
      input_files: diagram.mmd
```

### Multiple Files (Array Format)
```yaml
include:
  - component: $CI_SERVER_FQDN/gadhs/standard/pipeline-components/mermaid/diagram@v1.1.1
    inputs:
      stage: build
      job_name: diagram
      tag: runner-tag-name
      input_files:
        - user-permission.mmd
        - quality-and-standards.mmd
        - flowchart.mmd
```

### Wildcard Patterns
```yaml
include:
  - component: $CI_SERVER_FQDN/gadhs/standard/pipeline-components/mermaid/diagram@v1.1.1
    inputs:
      stage: build
      job_name: diagram
      tag: runner-tag-name
      input_files:
        - "*.mmd"
        - "diagram*.mmd"
```

## Integration with Other Jobs

The component generates artifacts that can be consumed by subsequent jobs using the `needs` keyword:

```yaml
pages:
  stage: pages
  needs:
    - job: diagram
      artifacts: true
  script:
    - # Your build script can now use the generated SVG files
```
